org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.driver

Class CFGVisualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.driver.CFGVisualization

  • public class CFGVisualization
extends Object
    Prints a CFG visualization to a file using the dot output format. Further processing can be done using tools such as Graphviz or graphical frontends such as ZGRviewer.
